title: Corrections & Amplifications

title: What the Board Needs to Know
description: Everything from the week beginning Sept. 25, 2023, that a corporate board director needs to know ahead of a board meeting. This week we look at the latest research showing serious gaps in board-level cybersecurity expertise among large public companies. Plus: the recent hacking of two Las Vegas casinos highlights the scrutiny board will come under following a cyberattack. We look at the various issues and implications boards face.
